title: Validation of Laws Act, 1975
description: Official consolidated text of Validation of Laws Act, 1975 (LXIII of 1975) published by The Pakistan Code (Civil Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement
provisions.content: _(1) This Act may be called the Validation of Laws Act,

provisions.title: Section 2. Validation of laws
provisions.content:
_ The laws mentioned in the Schedule are hereby declared to have
been validly made by competent authority.
_______
